answers.answer: I know what you mean. I have 47 left. I know with my diabetes I might be early. I'm still waiting for him to turn from breach position. Hope you enjoy your last weeks of pregnancy! Good luck.
74 days left! Time is still flying.
I Have 24 Days To Go & Time Seems As If It Is At A Standstill#Team Pink#1/10/15
31 days here! Can't come fast enough... Team pink as well!
I have 52 days left, everyone says she is going to come early.  I'm starting to think the same thing.
56 days! Team pink as well. I can't imagine feeling fuller or more stretched ..time is flying and standing still at the same time. Guess it depends how uncomfortable I am at the moment.
I have 11 days left and I'm too anxious!! Excited and I can't wait.
Oh, also we are waiting to find out the sex so that's adding to the anxiety.
Only 35 days left. Will be 36wks Tuesday moving right along!
18 days left, team pink. Hope she can hang on until after Christmas!! Congrats, and good luck ladies
54 days left and its going so fast at the moment not finding out the sex so its even more exciting ☺

question: Hey ladies im counting diwn and i have 50 days left!! 7 weeks to go. Cant wait to have my baby. I feel like i will go into labor 2-3 weeks before my due date.
title: omg getting close!!!
